metadata.title: Kling 3.0 AI Video Generator | Native Audio & 15s Clips | AnividAI
metadata.description: Generate cinematic AI videos with Kling 3.0 on AnividAI. Features native audio sync, multi-shot editing (up to 6 cuts), 15-second duration, and superior character consistency.
metadata.keywords: Kling 3.0, Kling AI Video 3.0, native audio video generator, multi-shot AI video, 15s AI video, character consistency AI, AnividAI Kling

Introduce.tagline: Kling 3.0 on AnividAI | The Next Gen of AI Video with Native Audio & Multi-Shot Control
Introduce.title: What is Kling 3.0?
Introduce.description: Kling 3.0 is a revolutionary AI video model that unifies video and audio generation. It supports up to 15-second clips, multi-shot editing with 6 cuts, and native audio synchronization. On AnividAI, creators can produce broadcast-ready content with unparalleled character consistency and cinematic direction.

benefits.title: Why Create with Kling 3.0 on AnividAI?
benefits.subtitle: Unlocking professional video production with advanced AI capabilities

items.title: Native Audio-Visual Sync
items.description: Generate synchronized dialogue, sound effects, and music directly with your video for an immersive experience.

items.title: Extended 15s Duration
items.description: Create longer, more complete stories with up to 15 seconds of continuous video generation.

items.title: Multi-Shot Cinematic Control
items.description: Direct up to 6 camera cuts in a single generation, enabling dynamic storytelling and professional editing flows.

items.title: Character Consistency
items.description: Maintain subject identity across shots with advanced image and video references, ensuring seamless narrative flow.

items.title: Cinematic Motion
items.description: Achieve film-quality results with precise camera movements including pan, tilt, zoom, and push.

items.title: Flexible Aspect Ratios
items.description: Output in 16:9, 9:16, or 1:1 to fit any social media or broadcast platform perfectly.

howToUse.title: Create with Kling 3.0 in 3 Steps
howToUse.subtitle: From concept to cinematic video in minutes

steps.title: Describe Scene & Audio
steps.description: Detail your visual scene and desired audio atmosphere (dialogue, SFX) in the prompt to guide the AI.

steps.title: Set Duration & Shots
steps.description: Choose up to 15s duration and define camera cuts if needed for multi-shot sequences.

steps.title: Generate & Refine
steps.description: Create your video with native audio and refine using Standard or Pro modes for the perfect finish.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Kling 3.0 on AnividAI

items.question: What's new in Kling 3.0 compared to previous versions?
items.answer: Kling 3.0 introduces native audio generation, extended 15-second duration, and multi-shot capabilities (up to 6 cuts), offering significantly more control and quality than previous iterations.

items.question: Can I generate audio with my video?
items.answer: Yes! Kling 3.0 supports native audio-visual co-generation, meaning it creates synchronized sound effects and dialogue along with the video.

items.question: How long can the videos be?
items.answer: You can generate videos up to 15 seconds long, a 50% increase from the previous 10-second limit, allowing for more complex storytelling.

items.question: What is Multi-Shot Cinematic Control?
items.answer: This feature allows you to specify up to 6 different camera cuts within a single generation, simulating a professionally edited sequence.

items.question: Does it support character consistency?
items.answer: Absolutely. Kling 3.0 features 'universe-strongest consistency', maintaining subject identity across different shots and scenes using image and video references.

items.question: What aspect ratios are available?
items.answer: Kling 3.0 supports standard ratios like 16:9 (widescreen), 9:16 (vertical/mobile), and 1:1 (square).

items.question: Can I use these videos commercially?
items.answer: Yes, videos generated on AnividAI can be used for commercial purposes, subject to platform policies.

items.question: How do I get the best results?
items.answer: Be specific in your prompts about both visual and audio elements. Use the reference tools for consistency and experiment with multi-shot settings for complex scenes.

call_to_action.title: Start Creating with Kling 3.0
call_to_action.subtitle: Experience the future of AI video with native audio and cinematic control.

empty-state.title: Start Creating Videos
empty-state.description: Enter a description, select style parameters, or click a sample video below to start generating

gallery.title: Video Gallery
gallery.hint: Hover to preview, click the card to watch, or use Reuse.

prompt.label: Describe Video Scene
prompt.placeholder: Example: A lone swordswoman walks through neon rain, slow push-in camera, reflective wet streets, dramatic backlight, cinematic mood
prompt.counter_too_long: Prompt exceeds the maximum length of {max} characters.
prompt.counter_too_short: Prompt must be at least {min} characters.

parameters.title: Video Parameters
parameters.multi_shot_switch_hint: Create multiple shots of the same video.
parameters.sound_description: Enable model-generated sound for this video.
parameters.negative_prompt_placeholder: Words or concepts to avoid in the video

reference.label: Reference
reference.title: Reference Image
reference.drag-drop: Drag & drop image here or click to select
reference.error-auth: Please log in to upload images
reference.disabled-oc-selected: Current model supports only one image. OC portrait is already selected, so reference image upload is disabled.
reference.cleared-by-oc: Reference image cleared because OC was selected and current model supports only one image.
reference.trimmed-by-limit: Some reference images were removed to match current model limits.
reference.start-end-hint: Image #1 is Start Frame, Image #2 is End Frame.
reference.multi-shots-first-frame-only: Multi-shots is enabled. Only the first frame image will be used.
reference.end-frame-disabled-multi-shot: End frame is disabled in multi-shot mode.

errors.not-authenticated: Please log in to access this video
errors.no-permission: You don't have permission to access this video
errors.auth-required: Please log in to access this video
errors.character-not-found: Character not found or you don't have access to it. Please select a character manually.
errors.invalid-character-uuid: Invalid character reference. Please select a character manually.
errors.character-load-error: Failed to load character. Please try again.
errors.invalid-reference-image-uuid: Invalid reference image. Please select an image manually.
errors.reference-image-load-error: Failed to load reference image. Please try again.
errors.multi-shot-min-segments: Multi-shot mode requires at least 1 prompt segment.
errors.multi-shot-duration-exceeded: Total multi-shot duration must be between 3 and 15 seconds.
errors.multi-shot-segment-duration-invalid: Each multi-shot segment duration must be between 3 and 12 seconds.
errors.multi-shot-start-frame-required: Multi-shot mode requires a start frame image.
errors.kling-duration-invalid: Kling 3.0 duration must be between 3 and 15 seconds.
errors.start-end-images-required: Start/End Frame mode requires exactly 2 reference images.

reuse.loading_desc: Preparing the selected video for reuse...

generating.title: Generating Video...
generating.tip: Creating your video, this may take a few minutes...

guest.title: Create Videos with AI
guest.description: Transform your prompts and characters into stunning videos. Sign in to start creating!

user.title: Start Creating Your Video
user.description: Enter a description, select your style and parameters, then click Generate to create your video

pending.title: Task Queued
pending.description: Generation task has been added to the queue. Please wait...

processing.title: Generating Video
processing.description: AI is creating your video. Video generation may take a few minutes.

completed.title: Generation Complete!
completed.description: Your video is ready to view and download.

failed.title: Generation Failed
failed.description: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.

canceled.title: Generation Canceled

unknown.title: Unknown Status
unknown.description: Unable to determine the current status.

processing-state.processing-tip: You can close this page and come back later. Generation will continue in the background.
